officialTitle: Holmium (Ho: YAG) Laser En Bloc Resection Of Bladder Tumor (HoLERBT) Versus Conventional Transurethral Resection Of Bladder Tumors (cTURBT): A Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial
inclusionCriteria: * Patients diagnosed at the out-patient cystoscopy with papillary bladder tumour will be legible for inclusion
exclusionCriteria:
* Tumor criteria

  * Non papillary gross features of the tumor
  * Anteriorly located tumor
* Patients criteria
* Poor performance status
* History of BCG sepsis
* History of bladder irradiation
* Contracted bladder
